Authorization to Use the Proportionate IVAP
Using the proportionate IVAP is authorized for original awards and reopened awards after a period of non-entitlement.
For the initial year of an original or reopened award, base the award on actual calendar year IVAP or proportional IVAP, whichever is lower.
